text: 4.14 Apo 6.6, 8.17, 13.3, 19.6, 1 Ti 1.18, 2 Ti 1.6 Ned bɨ Klays binɨb ne okok kɨlop kod mɨdebal okok, kɨli nep ñɨn dɨ mɨdɨl agɨlak. Pen ñɨn anɨb ak, bɨ God gos ñek agñeb olap nep agak. Agek, God ne bɨ anɨb ak kɨles tɨmel yad ak dɨl, wog yad gɨnɨmɨn agɨl, kɨles tɨmel ne ak nep ñub. Anɨb ak, God nep kɨles tɨmel ñub tek, sawl ma gɨnɨmɨn, pen mɨnek mɨnek wog ne anɨb ak gɨnɨmɨn.
